p: The herbal plant extracts were added to sunflower and soybean oils as solutions in absolute ethanol in the following quantities: 0.01, 0.03 and 0.07% (marjoram, thyme and oregano), 0.015 + 0.015% (mixture of oregano and thyme), 0.005 + 0.005% (mixture of thyme and BHA), 0.005 + 0.005% (mixture of oregano and BHA), and 0.01% of BHA. Afterwards, the samples were mixed and alcohol was evaporated in a rotary evaporator at 40 °C. The oil samples without extracts added were used as controls. All the prepared oils samples were subjected to DSC oxidation measurements.
